actions.title: Hand

actions.text: Random dealer. 17 (3) , 13 (4) or 10 (5 [2♦] & [2♣] removed) cards each.
actions.title: Deal

actions.text: All players choose 3 cards to pass face down.
actions.title: Pass Cards

actions.text: On 1st hand: pass to left, 2nd hand: pass to right, 3rd hand: pass opposite, 4th hand: no passing.
actions.title: Pass Rotation

actions.text: Player with 2♣ leads by playing it (or 3♣ if no 2♣).
actions.title: Play

actions.text: Lead any suit but not Hearts ♥ until a Heart has been played ('broken').
actions.title: Trick

actions.text: Play card following suit if possible.
actions.title: Try to follow suit

actions.text: Including Heart ♥ and Black Maria Q♠.
actions.title: Otherwise play any other suit

actions.text: Winner of Trick is highest rank of lead suit. Winner leads next trick until no more cards.
actions.title: Next Trick

actions.subtitle: Repeat until all cards have been played

actions.text: Each Heart won is 1pt. Black Maria Q♠ is 13pts.
actions.title: Score

actions.text: If player wins ALL Hearts & Q♠ remove 26pts from their score or add 26pts to all others (player choice).
actions.title: Shooting The Moon

actions.subtitle: Repeat until a player reaches target score

actions.text: A player reaches 100pts (or any value agreed). The player with the lowest score wins.
actions.title: Game End
